taskbody.prereq: You can add an attribute from the Domain Designer to a fragment or a module. The fragment or module must already be associated with a domain entity; see section .
taskbody.context: These steps explain how to add an attribute from the Domain Designer.

step.cmd: On the Domain outline view, click and hold the left mouse button on the attributes that you want to add to the diagram.
Drag the selected attributes to their desired location on the diagram.

taskbody.result:
A label and a widget are created:
The translations of the label widget are automatically inherited from the Domain Designer. These can be overridden locally, if necessary; see section .
The type of widget and some of its properties are derived from its business type; see section . These can be overridden locally, if necessary.
